title: R.A.E.C.E. Exodus
description: As a kid, Jack Junior shed blood when the enemy came. A small thing to him. The rest of growing up was a non-event.Train for fleet. Follow in his father's footsteps.Then the incidents of violence from genetically modified humans started. They called them GMO like some slur. Jack Junior was one of them.Exile into cryo-sleep is the solution until they could find a way to rewire the soldiers out of them. One day out for a year of hibernation. He watched his parents grow old and die in a few weeks. A never-ending horror show.The enemy is back, and guess who Fleet wants on the line?Military science fiction of the highest order. Jack is the one.
author: Geoffrey C. Porter
